name: File War
description:
File War is a small FPS Game for 1 player, just for fun. A game can be finish in 5 to 10 minutes.

It as been maid for the 13th Mini Jam.

It was a solo dev project, to test my abilities and to dig into this new type of game (i mean it's my first FPS like this).

Hope you will enjoy playing !

Mordekayy

PS : Sorry for the sound design, I know it's not that great...
